items.title: Trump’s tariffs are tarnishing the dollar’s global appeal. The damage may be hard to reverse.
items.description: The dollar’s safe-haven and reserve status may be in jeopardy after Trump’s April 2 tariffs.

items.title: Mortgage rates soar, prompting home buyers to seek refuge in adjustable-rate loans
items.description: Mortgage applications fell 8.5% in the last week, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

items.title: Why this strategist is expecting a lost decade for U.S. stocks, even without a recession
items.description: That U.S. exceptionalism argument is not going to work for the next five to 10 years, say strategists at BCA Research.

items.title: 3 reasons why Boeing’s stock will be fine even with China halting airplane orders
items.description: Boeing finds itself in the middle of a trade war, but just how much does it need to worry?
